support.title: Support

support.responseTime: We typically respond within 24-48 hours during business days.

diners.title: For Diners
diners.description: Need help using the app? Have questions about restaurants or menus? We're here to assist you.
diners.help3: How to write and manage reviews

restaurants.title: For Restaurant Owners
restaurants.description: Questions about managing your restaurant profile or menus? Our team is ready to help.
restaurants.help1: Setting up and managing your restaurant profile

intro.title: Introduction
intro.text1: At Menuteca, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our mobile application.
intro.text2: This policy complies with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and applicable Spanish data protection laws.

diners.title: From Diners:
diners.item3: User-generated content: reviews, ratings, and photos
diners.item4: Location data: real-time location (with permission) for map functionality

restaurants.title: From Restaurant Owners:
restaurants.item1: Business information: restaurant name, address, contact details
restaurants.item2: Menu data: menu names, prices, dishes, descriptions
restaurants.item3: Media: photos of restaurant and dishes

dataUse.title: How We Use Your Data
dataUse.item1: Provide core service functionality (showing menus and restaurants)
dataUse.item3: Allow restaurants to manage their profiles and menus
dataUse.item4: Display relevant nearby restaurants based on location
dataUse.item5: Improve app functionality and user experience

ai.title: AI Menu Processing
ai.text1: Restaurant owners can upload photos of their menus to be processed by our AI system. This system automatically extracts menu information (dishes, prices, descriptions) to make menu creation faster.
ai.text2: Photos uploaded for AI processing are used solely for menu extraction and are not stored permanently or used for any other purpose.

sharing.title: Data Sharing
sharing.text: We do NOT sell your personal data to third parties. We may share information only in the following limited circumstances:
sharing.item1: Public reviews are visible to all app users
sharing.item2: With service providers who help us operate the app (hosting, analytics)
sharing.item3: When required by law or to protect our legal rights

gdpr.title: Your Rights (GDPR)
gdpr.intro: Under GDPR, you have the following rights regarding your personal data:
gdpr.right1: Right to access your personal data
gdpr.right2: Right to rectification (update or correct information)
gdpr.right4: Right to data portability (export your data)
gdpr.contact: To exercise any of these rights, please contact us at admin@menutecaapp.com

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking
cookies.text1: Our app uses minimal cookies and tracking technologies:

types.title: Types of data stored:
types.essential: Essential: Authentication tokens to keep you logged in

cookies.text2: We do not use third-party advertising cookies or track you across other websites.

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.item1: Active accounts: Data retained indefinitely while account is active
retention.item2: Deleted accounts: Personal data removed within 30 days
retention.item3: Public reviews: May remain anonymized after account deletion to preserve review integrity

security.title: Data Security
security.text: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.text: Our service is not intended for users under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.text: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by updating the 'Last Updated' date at the top of this policy.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.text: If you have questions about this privacy policy or how we handle your data, please contact us:

product.comingSoon: Coming soon to the App Store and Google Play!

hero.title: Discover the best set menus near you
hero.subtitle: The only app dedicated exclusively to fixed-price restaurant menus. Find daily menus, weekend specials, and tasting menus with complete transparency.

feature1.title: Exclusive Focus on Set Menus
feature1.text: No distractions. We only show restaurants with fixed-price menus, making your search quick and focused.

feature2.title: Real-Time Location
feature2.text: Find restaurants near you with our interactive map. See exactly where each restaurant is and how far away.

feature3.title: Complete Price Transparency
feature3.text: All prices are visible upfront. See exactly what's included: bread, drinks, coffee, dessert, and any supplements.

feature4.title: Always Up-to-Date
feature4.text: Restaurants update their menus daily. No more outdated information or surprises when you arrive.

feature5.title: AI-Powered Menu Creation
feature5.text: For restaurants: take a photo of your menu board and our AI converts it to digital in seconds.

feature6.title: Authentic Reviews
feature6.text: Real reviews from real diners with photos. See what others experienced before you go.

restaurants.title: For Restaurants
restaurants.subtitle: Attract more customers by showcasing your daily menus

benefit1.title: 100% Free Forever
benefit1.text: No subscription fees, no commissions, no hidden costs. Register up to 10 restaurants completely free.

benefit2.title: Update Menus in Seconds
benefit2.text: Take a photo of your menu board and our AI does the rest. Or edit manually anytime you want.

benefit3.title: Reach Hungry Customers
benefit3.text: Your menus appear to users searching nearby. Get discovered by people looking for exactly what you offer.

testimonial1.text: I used to waste so much time calling restaurants to ask about their daily menu. Now I just open Menuteca and see everything in seconds!
testimonial1.author: Maria G.

testimonial2.text: As a restaurant owner, this app has been a game-changer. The AI menu feature saves me 10 minutes every morning, and we're getting more lunch customers than ever.
testimonial2.author: Carlos R.

testimonial3.text: Perfect for finding affordable lunch options near my office. I love that I can see all the dishes before I go. No more surprises!
testimonial3.author: Jordi M.

cta.title: Ready to Discover Great Menus?
cta.text: Download Menuteca today and never wonder what's for lunch again.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.text1: Welcome to Menuteca. By accessing or using our mobile application, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions.
intro.text2: Please read these terms carefully before using our service. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, you may not use our application.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.text: By creating an account and using Menuteca, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions, as well as our Privacy Policy.

userAccounts.title: User Accounts
userAccounts.item1: You must be at least 13 years old to use this service
userAccounts.item2: You must provide accurate and complete information
userAccounts.item3: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account
userAccounts.item4: You must not share your account credentials with others
userAccounts.diner: Diner Account: For users who want to discover restaurants and write reviews
userAccounts.restaurant: Restaurant Account: For restaurant owners who want to manage their establishment's profile and menus

userConduct.title: User Conduct and Responsibilities
userConduct.item2: Not engage in any fraudulent or deceptive activities
userConduct.item3: Not violate any applicable laws or regulations
userConduct.item4: Not harass, abuse, or harm other users
userConduct.item5: Not upload malicious software or viruses
userConduct.diner1: Write honest and genuine reviews based on real experiences
userConduct.diner2: Not post fake, misleading, or malicious reviews
userConduct.diner3: Not post offensive, discriminatory, or inappropriate content
userConduct.diner4: Not attempt to manipulate ratings or reviews
userConduct.restaurant1: Provide accurate information about their restaurant
userConduct.restaurant2: Keep menu information up-to-date and accurate
userConduct.restaurant3: Not create fake reviews or manipulate ratings
userConduct.restaurant4: Not impersonate other restaurants or users

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.item1: Content Ownership: You retain ownership of the content you upload (photos, reviews, menu information)
intellectualProperty.item2: License to Menuteca: By uploading content, you grant Menuteca a worldwide, non-exclusive license to use, display, and distribute your content within the app
intellectualProperty.item3: App Ownership: All rights to the Menuteca application, design, and functionality remain with Menuteca
intellectualProperty.item4: Prohibited Use: You may not copy, modify, or reverse-engineer any part of the application

reviews.title: Reviews and User-Generated Content
reviews.item1: Reviews must be based on genuine personal experiences
reviews.item2: We reserve the right to remove reviews that violate our policies
reviews.item3: Reviews may remain on the platform even after account deletion to preserve review integrity
reviews.item4: You agree not to post content that is defamatory, obscene, or infringes on others' rights

free.title: Free Service:
free.text: Menuteca is completely free for restaurants. You can register up to 10 restaurants per account at no cost.

ai.title: AI Menu Processing:
ai.text: Our AI menu photo processing is provided as-is. While we strive for accuracy, we cannot guarantee 100% accuracy in menu extraction. Restaurant owners are responsible for verifying and correcting AI-generated menu data.

noCommissions.title: No Commissions:
noCommissions.text: We do not charge commissions on reservations or orders. Any reservation or contact features link directly to the restaurant's own systems.

accuracy.title: Information Accuracy:
accuracy.text: While we strive to maintain accurate information, we cannot guarantee that all restaurant information, menus, and prices are always current or correct. Users should verify details directly with restaurants.

service.title: Service Availability:
service.text: We provide the service 'as-is' without warranties of any kind. We do not guarantee uninterrupted or error-free service.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability:
liability.text: Menuteca is not responsible for any disputes between users and restaurants, food quality, allergies, or dining experiences. We are a discovery platform only.

termination.title: Account Termination
termination.item1: You may delete your account at any time from the app settings
termination.item2: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these terms
termination.item3: Upon termination, your personal data will be deleted as described in our Privacy Policy
termination.item4: Public reviews may remain anonymized after account deletion

modifications.title: Modifications to Terms
modifications.text: We may update these Terms and Conditions from time to time. We will notify users of significant changes through the app. Continued use of the service after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

governingLaw.title: Governing Law
governingLaw.text: These Terms and Conditions are governed by the laws of Spain. Any disputes shall be resolved in the courts of Barcelona, Spain.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.text: If you have questions about these Terms and Conditions, please contact us:
